## hpr1836 :: The Statusnet Shuffle

 
Theru and NYbill talk about moving a Statusnet instance to a new server.  Also, upgrading an existing Statusnet instance to GNU-social.


Theru's blog post: https://blog.theru.org/how-i-move-my-status-net-server-and-upgrade-it-to-gnu-social/

Windigo's blog post on running SN/GS with nginx:
https://fragdev.com/blog/gnusocial-on-nginx-with-php-fpm
